title: Country-con
desc: Make the future bright with your insight! Put your critical-thinking skills to the test! Join us as we explore the countless conundrums faced by multiple countries.

title: Ideathon
desc: Get, Set, Ideate! Here's a great opportunity presented by an esteemed organisation like DRDO to solve the problems associated with current trends

title: The Forensic Deception
desc: A culprit on the run,A crime scene left behind.Discover the highly Of deciphering the clues.And when it all feels elementary, the crime scene tape lifts up, To allow you entry.Psst, Sherlock would be lost without Watson, so come in teams of 2!
